volumeRendering Module¶

volumina.view3d.volumeRendering.makeVolumeRenderingPipeline(in_volume)[source]¶
class volumina.view3d.volumeRendering.LabelManager(n)[source]¶

Bases: object

request()[source]¶
free(label=None)[source]¶
class volumina.view3d.volumeRendering.RenderingManager(renderer, qvtk=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Encapsulates the work of adding/removing objects to the rendered volume and setting their colors.

Conceptually very simple: given a volume containing integer labels (where zero labels represent transparent background) and a color map, renders the objects in the appropriate color.
